cast.name: 黛穆拉·苏奈马兹 Damla Sönmez
坎塞尔·埃尔金 Cansel Elcin
埃兹格.阿萨奥古鲁 Ezgi Asaroglu
阿尔坦·马里利 Altan Erkekli

director.name: 坎塞尔·埃尔金 Cansel Elcin

introduction: All these years, novels and movies have always covered stories in which the main characters from the Western World travel to India. These characters are introduced to a very meaningful and spiritual world very different from the Western world they live in, and in which their souls undergo changes through this journey. "KAMPUSTE CIPLAK AYAKLAR" 'BARE FOOT ON CAMPUS'tries to take a different perspective at the same story by totally looking at it the other way around. In this story the main characters don't go to India, On the contrary, India comes to where they are.. An Indian girl named Shiva comes to the University in Turkey and starts changing the lives of the students around her. The story reaches it's climax when the shocking secret of Shiva is revealed.
